factors.description: Physical factors that can influence mental health
factors.evidence: Family history often shows patterns of certain conditions across generations

factors.description: Mental and emotional factors that shape responses to life events
factors.evidence: Adverse childhood experiences correlate with higher risk of mental health issues

factors.description: External conditions that impact mental wellbeing
factors.evidence: Job loss and financial hardship often precede depression episodes

factors.description: Daily habits and choices that affect mental health
factors.evidence: Regular physical activity is associated with reduced anxiety symptoms
